metadata.title: How Long Is the Sampling Time?

sections.content:
Question:
How long is the sampling time?
Answer:
Sampling time per electrode is described below:
Self-capacitance method approx. 500 μs
Mutual capacitance method: approx. 1000 μs
The measurement time of the mutual capacitance method is double that of the self-capacitance method because the mutual capacitance calculates touch results from two measurement results.
Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
